spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The psurlon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

trait.name: Aberrant Mind
entries: Magic can't read the psurlon's thoughts or put the psurlon to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The psurlon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Psychic Crush
entries: The psurlon targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The target must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
